participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing, enjoys engaging with others and sharing interests.
participant_1.background: my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. i love to play board games. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach. i'm an elementary school teacher. my parents were also teachers.

participant_2.background: mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to go to disney world every year. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i'm in the third grade.
